duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively identifying and recommending products and services (e.g., Credit Cards, CD's, IRA's, Loans) to help members reach their financial goals.
Servicing members on the teller line with monetary transactions, account maintenance, ownership changes, wire requests, IRA transactions, automatic transfers, disputes, and notary public services.
Maintaining and deepening member relationships through consultative analysis and recommendation of Desert Financial products.
Strategically building and optimizing referral network and pipeline to meet or exceed monthly performance metrics through outbound calls, community outreach, and networking.
Ensuring availability during branch hours of operation, including Saturdays.
